segments.text: I can't help but feel a knot of anxiety tightening in my stomach as I watch the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on that two-step stool, and it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, almost at an impossible angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear it's going to tip backward at any second, sending him crashing to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched so high, reaching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is deep inside, and the other is holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame him, almost like a spotlight on the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him seems completely unaware of the peril, just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep expecting to hear a crash and a cry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would notice and prevent an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a very tense moment, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to stay upright.
segments.speaker: PAR
